thread.title: As the 2015 Academic Year Starts, 2Way Supply Advises Colleges & Universities on How they Can Improve Staff Communication with New Motorola DLR Digital Two-Way Radios
thread.title_full: As the 2015 Academic Year Starts, 2Way Supply Advises Colleges & Universities on How they Can Improve Staff Communication with New Motorola DLR Digital Two-Way Radios - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: As the 2015 Academic Year Starts, 2Way Supply Advises Colleges & Universities on How they Can Improve Staff Communication with New Motorola DLR Digital Two-Way Radios
text:
2Way Supply, a leading Motorola distributor, is advising colleges and universities on how they can improve communication by equipping their staff with the new Motorola DLR Digital two-way radios.
MCKINNEY, TX (PRWEB) September 14, 2015
As the 2015 academic year starts, 2Way Supply , a leading Motorola distributor, is advising colleges and universities on how they can improve communication by equipping their staff with the new Motorola DLR Digital two-way radios.
“Colleges and universities are under pressure to maintain high communication standards, which can be difficult to achieve as they cut budgets and deal with increased student enrollment,” commented Ken Braswell, the owner of 2Way Supply. “The new Motorola DLR Digital two-way radios are an effective way to improve campus-wide communication, which helps streamline operations, while also support student and staff safety.”
According to Braswell and his team at 2Way, a key feature of the new DLR Digital two-way radios that will be especially advantageous to colleges and universities is that that they deliver clear communications indoors or outdoors covering up to 300,000 square feet/20 floors. This can be increased to 600,000 square feet by adding the optional range extender.
Furthermore, colleges and universities do not have to pay for regulatory licenses or administrative fees. Plus, the radios operate in the 900 MHz ISM, and use hopping technology to continually change frequencies, which makes it essentially impossible for unauthorized parties to listen in.
Other key features include: private reply, direct call, call all available, instant mute, talk permit tones, home channel, compact and lightweight design, built-in antimicrobial protection, ease-of-use, and 14-hour battery life with easy recharging in individual charging units. Multi-unit chargers that charge up to 12 radios at a time are also available.
More information on the groundbreaking new DLR Digital two-way radios can be found on the 2Way Supply website: http://2waysupply.com
About 2Way Supply
2Way Supply is an authorized Motorola dealer specializing in Motorola 2Way radios, parts and accessories. It is a wholly owned subsidiary and a Texas based business. 2Way Supply (2waysupply.com) serves as an easy-to-use e-commerce site for Motorola 2Way radios and accessories and features low prices on a great selection of needed items for schools as well as industrial, entertainment, sports, property management, construction, safety, and business clients.
